<div id="cookie-consent" class="cookie-consent">
    <div class="cookie-desc">
        <div>This website uses cookies.</div>
        
            <br />
            <br />
            <a href="https://www.segwise.ai/privacy-policy"
               target="_blank"
               rel="noopener"
               class="text-green-500 underline">Learn more</a>
        
    </div>
    <div class="cookie-buttons">
        <button id="cookie-accept" class="accept" aria-label="Accept cookies">
            Accept
        </button>
        <button id="cookie-decline" class="decline" aria-label="Decline cookies">
            Decline
        </button>
    </div>
</div>
<script>
    (function() {
        const google_analytics_id = "";
        const google_adsense_pub_id = "";
        const cookieName = "segwise_cookie_popup_accept";

        let loadScripts = false;
        const COOKIE_POPUP_ACCEPT_VALUE = 'true';
        const COOKIE_POPUP_DECLINE_VALUE = 'false';

        function setCookie(name, value, days) {
            const expires = new Date(Date.now() + days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toUTCString();
            document.cookie = `${name}=${value}; expires=${expires}; path=/; Secure; SameSite=Strict`;
        }

        function getCookie(name) {
            const match = document.cookie.match(new RegExp('(^| )' + name + '=([^;]+)'));
            return match ? match[2] : null;
        }

        function eraseCookie(name) {
            document.cookie = name + '=; Max-Age=-99999999;';
        }

        const loadGoogleAnalytics = () => {
            const googleAnalytics = document.createElement('script');
            googleAnalytics.src = `https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=${google_analytics_id}`;
            document.body.append(googleAnalytics);

            window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];

            function gtag() {
                window.dataLayer.push(arguments);
            }
            gtag('js', new Date());
            gtag('config', google_analytics_id);
        };

        const loadGoogleAdsense = () => {
            var d = document,
                s = d.createElement('script');
            s.src = `https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js`;
            s.async = true;

            s.setAttribute('data-ad-client', `ca-pub-${google_adsense_pub_id}`);
            (d.head || d.body).appendChild(s);
        };

        const showCookiePopup = () => {
            document.getElementById('cookie-consent').style.display = 'block';
        };

        const hideCookiePopup = () => {
            document.getElementById('cookie-consent').style.display = 'none';
        };

        document.getElementById('cookie-accept').addEventListener('click', () => {
            if (google_analytics_id) {
                loadGoogleAnalytics();
            }
            if (google_adsense_pub_id) {
                loadGoogleAdsense();
            }
            loadScripts = true;
            setCookie(cookieName, COOKIE_POPUP_ACCEPT_VALUE, 365);
            hideCookiePopup();
        });

        document.getElementById('cookie-decline').addEventListener('click', () => {
            setCookie(cookieName, COOKIE_POPUP_DECLINE_VALUE, 365);
            hideCookiePopup();
        });

        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            localStorage.removeItem("Segwise_cookie_popup_accept"); //TODO: delete old ls

            if (getCookie(cookieName) === COOKIE_POPUP_ACCEPT_VALUE) {
                loadScripts = true;
                if (google_analytics_id) {
                    loadGoogleAnalytics();
                }
                if (google_adsense_pub_id) {
                    loadGoogleAdsense();
                }
            } else {
                if (google_analytics_id || google_adsense_pub_id) {
                    showCookiePopup();
                }
            }
        });
    })();
</script>

                    <div id="post-body" class="mt-12 [&>*:first-child]:!mt-0"><html><head></head><body><p>With over <a href="https://42matters.com/stats">4 million</a> apps competing for attention on the App Store and Google Play, optimizing your marketing spend is essential for survival. Thatâ€™s where a mobile measurement partner list becomes your secret weapon.</p><p>In 2025, tracking and analyzing user acquisition (UA) performance remains a key challenge for mobile game developers. Various attribution solutions exist to help understand whatâ€™s driving installs, retention, and revenue. But with so many options, how do you choose the right one? This blog breaks down the top mobile measurement partners in 2025, their standout features, and how to align them with your user acquisition (UA) goals. Letâ€™s dive in.</p><h2 id="what-are-mobile-measurement-partners">What Are Mobile Measurement Partners?<div class="se-image-container" contenteditable="false" style="width: 100%;"><figure style="margin: auto; max-width: 100%; width: 100%; height: auto; "><img src="https://assets.superblog.ai/site_cuid_clo00o2d0644641vqp8vh8w6cd/images/image-cp-1739965889189-compressed.png" alt="undefined" style="min-height: 175px;" data-file-name="image-cp-1739965889189-compressed.png" data-file-size="0" data-origin="100%,auto" data-size="100%,auto" origin-size="1600,900" data-index="0" width="100%" height="auto" fetchpriority="high"/></figure></div></h2><p><span style="background-color: inherit;">Mobile Measurement Partners (MMPs) are third-party platforms that track, analyze, and attribute user interactions across your marketing campaigns. Think of them as your campaignâ€™s â€œtruth-tellersâ€ as they answer critical questions like:</span></p><ul><li><p>Which ad drove that install?</p></li><li><p>Which channel has the lowest cost per acquisition (CPA)?</p></li><li><p>Whereâ€™s your ad budget leaking to fraud?</p></li></ul><p>Integrating an MMPâ€™s SDK into your games or apps gives you a unified view of your UA performance, from ad networks and DSPs like TikTok ads to Google App Campaigns. While these tools aim to provide clarity, analysis often involves some level of interpretation, and different platforms may have inherent biases.Â </p><p>Understanding these nuances is key to making informed decisions about your UA strategy. But what sets an effective MMP apart from the rest? Let's explore the key features to prioritize in 2025.</p><h2 id="key-features-to-consider"><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Key Features to Consider<div class="se-image-container" contenteditable="false" style="width: 100%;"><figure style="margin: auto; max-width: 100%; width: 100%; height: auto; "><img src="https://assets.superblog.ai/site_cuid_clo00o2d0644641vqp8vh8w6cd/images/image-cp-1739965890332-compressed.png" alt="undefined" style="width: 100%; height: auto;" data-file-name="image-cp-1739965890332-compressed.png" data-file-size="0" data-origin="100%,auto" data-size="100%,auto" origin-size="1600,900" data-index="1" loading="lazy"/></figure></div></strong></h2><p><span style="background-color: inherit;">Not all MMPs are built for the complexities of B2B marketing. To maximize ROI and streamline attribution, focus on these critical capabilities:</span></p><h3 id="accurate-attribution"><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Accurate Attribution</strong></h3><p>You need a platform that goes beyond basic tracking. Ensure your MMP supports:</p><ul><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Multi-touch attribution </strong>to distribute credit across multiple interactions, reflecting how different touchpoints contribute to conversions.</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Time-decay attribution </strong>to assign more value to recent interactions, which is crucial for tracking late-stage engagement in long sales cycles.</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Last-click attribution </strong>to pinpoint the final touchpoint that led to a conversion.</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Account-based marketing (ABM) </strong>tracking measures engagement at the account level, ensuring marketing influences the right decision-makers.</p></li></ul><h3 id="data-analysis-andamp-reporting"><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Data Analysis & Reporting</strong></h3><p>Raw data isnâ€™t enoughâ€”you need actionable insights. Look for:</p><ul><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Custom dashboards </strong>to track key metrics like lead quality, sales cycle length, and pipeline velocity.</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Advanced filtering & segmentation </strong>to analyze performance by industry, company size, or deal stage.</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">ROI calculations</strong> that connect marketing spend directly to revenue impact.</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Lead attribution </strong>to identify which marketing efforts generate qualified leads and move deals forward.</p></li></ul><h3 id="seamless-integrations"><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Seamless Integrations</strong></h3><p>Your MMP should work within your existing tech stack, not add complexity. Prioritize:</p><ul><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">CRM integration </strong>for a unified view of marketing and sales impact.</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Marketing automation </strong>integration to ensure smooth lead nurturing and campaign execution.</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Customer journey mapping </strong>to visualize multi-channel interactions and optimize touchpoints along the buyerâ€™s path.</p></li></ul><h3 id="fraud-preventionandnbsp"><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Fraud PreventionÂ </strong></h3><p>Wasted ad spend and inaccurate data can derail your marketing strategy. Your MMP must include:</p><ul><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Click fraud detection </strong>to eliminate fake clicks and ensure accurate attribution.</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Bot activity tracking </strong>to prevent automated traffic from skewing campaign data.</p></li></ul><h3 id="scalability-andamp-complianceandnbsp"><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Scalability & ComplianceÂ </strong></h3><p>Your MMP should grow with your business while meeting regulatory requirements. Ensure it:</p><ul><li><p>Complies with data privacy regulations like GDPR and CCPA to protect sensitive customer data.</p></li><li><p>Can scale with your needs, handling large datasets, complex attribution models, and increasing campaign volume efficiently.</p></li></ul><p>With these capabilities, you can confidently choose an MMP that delivers measurable results and aligns with your long-term business goals. Now that we know what to look for letâ€™s dive into the top MMPs dominating the market in 2025.</p><h2 id="top-mobile-measurement-partners-in-2025"><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Top Mobile Measurement Partners in 2025</strong></h2><p>Based on scalability, gaming-specific features, and industry trust, hereâ€™s your 2025 mobile measurement partner list:</p><h3 id="1-appsflyer"><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">1. Kochava</strong></h3><div class="se-image-container" contenteditable="false" style="width: 100%;"><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f"><figure style="margin: auto; max-width: 100%; width: 100%; height: auto; margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;"><img src="https://assets.superblog.ai/site_cuid_clo00o2d0644641vqp8vh8w6cd/images/b64-1739965898067-compressed.png" alt="undefined" style="width: 100%; height: auto;" data-file-name="b64-1739965898067-compressed.png" data-file-size="0" data-origin="100%,auto" data-size="100%,auto" origin-size="1600,653" data-index="6" loading="lazy"/></figure></strong></div><p><a href="https://www.kochava.com/">Kochava</a> provides real-time user acquisition analytics for hybrid monetization games, integrating CTV and mobile attribution with robust fraud prevention measures. Its dashboards offer sub-minute latency and cross-platform data pipelines, ideal for performance marketers balancing in-app purchases and ad revenue. With omnichannel tracking across mobile, web, and CTV, Kochava ensures GDPR compliance.</p><h4><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Key Features</strong></h4><ul><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Real-Time Dashboards: </strong>Notifies you if ROAS drops by 10%+ (via Slack/email).</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">CTV + Mobile Sync: </strong>Measures UA impact of CTV ads on mobile installs (e.g., Amazon Fire TV campaigns).</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Fraud Blocklists: </strong>Prevents ad spend leakage by blacklisting fraudulent publishers.</p></li></ul><h4><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Pricing</strong></h4><ul><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Free App AnalyticsÂ®: </strong>$0/month (Includes 10K conversions/month)</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Foundation: </strong>Starting at $500/month (Includes 33K conversions/month)</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Enterprise: </strong>Starting at $2,000/month (Includes 200K MAU/month)</p></li></ul><p>Kochavaâ€™s work with DraftKings and Huuuge Games underscores its strength in performance marketing for hybrid monetization models (IAP + ads).Â </p><p>With a clear picture of the top MMPs, letâ€™s compare them side by side to highlight their strengths and differences.</p><h3 id="6-tenjin">6. Tenjin</h3><div class="se-image-container" contenteditable="false" style="width: 100%;"><figure style="margin: auto; max-width: 100%; width: 100%; height: auto; margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;"><img src="https://assets.superblog.ai/site_cuid_clo00o2d0644641vqp8vh8w6cd/images/image-cp-1750849797317-compressed.png" alt="undefined" style="width: 100%; height: auto;" data-file-name="image-cp-1750849797317-compressed.png" data-file-size="0" data-origin="100%,auto" data-size="100%,auto" data-index="7" loading="lazy"/></figure></div><p>â€‹<a href="https://tenjin.com/" alt="Tenjin" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Tenjin</a> empowers growing mobile publishers to scale with simple but effective advertising measurement tools. Starting at just $200/month, users access all features without hidden costs. Trusted by over 30,000 apps and thousands of partners, Tenjin has been driving success since graduating from the Y Combinator accelerator program in 2014.Â </p><h4>Key Features:</h4><ul><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-a2940a73-7fff-a870-1bbb-0711018b1ac5">Comprehensive Attribution & Analytics: </strong>Certified by Meta, Google, TikTok, and other networks, Tenjin enables precise tracking of user acquisition and ad monetization across channels.</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-a2940a73-7fff-a870-1bbb-0711018b1ac5">Seamless Dashboard & Interface: </strong>The intuitive dashboard simplifies integration and centralizes all your data for easy access and analysis.</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-a2940a73-7fff-a870-1bbb-0711018b1ac5">Instant Support & Data Insights: </strong>Tenjin provides immediate support via Teams, Slack, and WhatsApp, while offering raw data export and AI-driven insights without needing SQL.</p></li></ul><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-a2940a73-7fff-a870-1bbb-0711018b1ac5">Pricing:Â </strong></p><ul><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-a2940a73-7fff-a870-1bbb-0711018b1ac5">Free Plan: </strong>2,000 free conversions/month, no commitment.</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-a2940a73-7fff-a870-1bbb-0711018b1ac5">Starter Plan: </strong>10,000 conversions per month for just $200 a month. With the option to save $400 with an annual payment of $2,000/year. All add-ons included.</p></li><li><p><strong id="docs-internal-guid-a2940a73-7fff-a870-1bbb-0711018b1ac5">Custom Plan: </strong>Get the offer that fits your business needs perfectly. All add-ons included.</p></li></ul><p>With Tenjin, growing your app becomes easy, so you can focus on what matters, enhance performance, and improve results.</p><p>Now that we have a clear picture of the top MMPs, letâ€™s compare them side by side to highlight their strengths and differences.</p><h2 id="comparison-chart-mmps-for-mobile-gaming-ua-2025"><strong id="docs-internal-guid-36e700c5-7fff-6601-710b-cf721dd5ed4f">Comparison Chart: MMPs for Mobile Gaming UA (2025)</strong></h2><div class="se-image-container" contenteditable="false"><figure style="margin: 0px;"><img src="https://assets.superblog.ai/site_cuid_clo00o2d0644641vqp8vh8w6cd/images/segwise-1750929174517-compressed.jpg" alt="" data-rotate="" data-proportion="true" data-rotatex="" data-rotatey="" data-size="," data-align="none" data-percentage="auto,auto" data-index="9" data-file-name="undefined" data-file-size="undefined" data-origin="," style="" loading="lazy"/></figure></div><p><strong style="font-family: Archivo; background-color: inherit; color: rgb(18, 18, 18); font-size: 1.17em;">Why This Matters?</strong></p><ul><li><p><strong>Budget Efficiency: </strong>AppsFlyer and Adjust lead in fraud prevention, directly lowering CPI for UA campaigns.</p></li><li><p><strong>Creative Optimization: </strong>Singularâ€™s A/B testing tools maximize ad spend ROI, which is critical for hybrid-casual games.</p></li><li><p><strong>Privacy Compliance: </strong>All MMPs except the Branch offer full SKAdNetwork support, ensuring iOS campaign scalability<strong>.</strong></p></li></ul><p>With a solid understanding of their impact, letâ€™s break down the key benefits of using an MMP.</p><h2 id="benefits-of-using-top-mmps-in-mobile-gaming"><strong>Benefits of Using Top MMPs in Mobile Gaming</strong></h2><p>Leveraging the right Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP) is crucial for optimizing user acquisition, maximizing ROI, and protecting ad budgets from fraud. Below are the key benefits of using top MMPs in 2025:Â </p><h3 id="1-gaining-enhanced-understanding-across-networks"><strong>1. Gaining Enhanced Understanding Across Networks</strong></h3><p>Top MMPs like Singular, AppsFlyer, and Adjust provide a unified view of user acquisition data across multiple ad networks, platforms, and campaigns. This holistic perspective is essential for mobile gaming developers and marketers to identify which networks drive the most valuable users.</p><ul><li><p><strong>Free Plan vs. Paid Plan: </strong>Free plans typically offer basic cross-network reporting, while paid plans unlock advanced features like cohort analysis, cross-channel attribution, and granular demographic breakdowns. For example, Singularâ€™s free plan includes <a href="https://www.singular.net/pricing/">revenue attribution</a>, a rare feature among MMPs, making it ideal for indie developers or small studios. Paid plans, however, provide predictive analytics and custom dashboards, which are critical for scaling user acquisition efforts.</p></li></ul><h3 id="2-utilizing-advanced-attribution-and-analytics-tools"><strong>2. Utilizing Advanced Attribution and Analytics Tools</strong></h3><p>Advanced attribution is the backbone of any successful mobile gaming user acquisition strategy. MMPs offer sophisticated attribution models, such as last-click, multi-touch, and probabilistic attribution, to accurately measure campaign performance.</p><ul><li><p><strong>Free Plan vs. Paid Plan: </strong>Free plans usually include basic attribution capabilities, such as last-click attribution and limited data retention. Paid plans, on the other hand, provide access to multi-touch attribution, real-time reporting, and custom attribution windows. For instance, Singularâ€™s free plan includes revenue attribution, while its paid plans offer SKAdNetwork Cohort Prediction and advanced creative reporting.</p></li></ul><h3 id="3-fraud-prevention-in-user-acquisition"><strong>3. Fraud Prevention in User Acquisition</strong></h3><p>Fraud prevention is a critical aspect of mobile gaming user acquisition, as ad fraud can drain budgets and skew campaign performance. Leading MMPs have developed robust fraud detection and prevention mechanisms to safeguard ad spend.</p><ul><li><p><strong>How MMPs Tackle Fraud:</strong></p></li><ul><li><p><strong>Singular: </strong>Offers over <a href="https://www.singular.net/fraud-prevention/">50 fraud detection and prevention methods</a>, including Android Install Receipt Validation and Click Hijacking Protection. Its fraud suite blocks fraudulent activity in real-time, ensuring that only legitimate users are attributed.</p></li><li><p><strong>AppsFlyer: </strong>Provides <a href="https://support.appsflyer.com/hc/en-us/articles/218254203-Protect360-anti-fraud-guide">Protect360</a>, a comprehensive fraud prevention suite that uses machine learning to detect and block fraudulent installs in real-time. It also offers granular fraud filters, such as click injection and SDK spoofing protection.</p></li><li><p><strong>Adjust: </strong>Features a <a href="https://www.adjust.com/product-comparison/adjust-vs-singular/">Fraud Prevention Suite</a> that combines AI-driven fraud detection with manual rule-setting. Adjustâ€™s solution is particularly effective for high-volume gaming apps, offering transparency and proactive fraud blocking.</p></li></ul><li><p><strong>Free Plan vs. Paid Plan: </strong>Fraud prevention is often limited or unavailable in free plans. Paid plans unlock advanced fraud detection tools, real-time blocking, and detailed fraud analytics. For example, Singularâ€™s free plan includes basic fraud detection, while its paid plans offer proactive fraud prevention features, saving customers up to <a href="https://www.singular.net/fraud-prevention/">25% of their ad budgets</a>.</p></li></ul><p>To maximize ROI in mobile gaming user acquisition, you need an MMP that delivers advanced attribution, fraud prevention, and cross-network insights. The right MMP helps you focus on high-performing campaigns, protect your ad budget from fraud, and gain a competitive edge with data-driven insights into user behavior and lifetime value (LTV).Â </p><p>Whether you choose a free or paid plan, selecting the right MMP in 2025 will be crucial for optimizing your marketing strategy and driving sustainable growth.Â </p><h2 id="conclusion"><strong>Conclusion</strong></h2><p>Mobile Measurement Partners (MMPs) play a crucial role in helping app marketers track performance, optimize campaigns, and protect ad spending. They provide accurate attribution, real-time analytics, fraud detection, and privacy compliance, ensuring you get clear insights into whatâ€™s working. Platforms like AppsFlyer, Adjust, Singular, Branch, and Kochava each bring unique features, making it important to choose one that fits your goals, budget, and integration needs.</p><p>To take your user acquisition efforts even further, <a href="https://www.segwise.ai/">Segwise</a> offers an AI-first user acquisition platform that <a href="https://www.segwise.ai/ai-monitoring">automatically monitors</a> your campaign data down to an ad asset level, freeing you from the heavy lifting of data analysis. By focusing on <a href="https://www.segwise.ai/creative-insights">creative analytics</a>, it provides actionable insights to optimize your return on ad spend (ROAS) and enhance campaign performance.</p><p>With seamless integration across Adjust, AppsFlyer, Singular, and major ad networks, Segwise empowers you to make confident, data-backed decisions that drive results.</p><p>Supercharge your marketing strategy with Segwise.     <button id="btnShowCommentForm" class="btn btn-primary">

    <div id="comment-form-container" class="flex hidden flex-col gap-8 w-full">
        <div id="commentForm" class="flex hidden flex-col gap-4 w-full">
            <h2 class="text-2xl font-bold text-center">Comments</h2>

                      class="w-full textarea min-h-[100px]"

                    id="comment-submit"

             class="flex hidden flex-col gap-4 items-center w-full">

            <button aria-label="Add another comment"
                    id="add-another-comment"
                    class="btn btn-primary">Add another comment</button>

        <p id="comment-error" class="hidden text-center text-error"></p>

        <div id="comment-list-error" class="hidden text-center text-error"></div>
    </div>
    <script>
        (function() {
            const cuid = "cm7buorju009v13xn0an1tce2";
            const siteCuid = "clo00o2d0644641vqp8vh8w6cd";
            const localeData = JSON.parse(`{"addNewComment":"Add new comment","allPosts":"All Posts","allRightsReserved":"All rights reserved","author":"Author","backToArticle":"Back to article","coAuthor":"Co-Author","comments":"Comments","contents":"Contents","cookieAcceptBtnText":"Accept","cookieDeclineBtnText":"Decline","cookieLearnMoreText":"Learn more","cookieNotice":"This website uses cookies.","createdAt":{"$__toml_private_datetime":"2023-11-07T07:23:52.367Z"},"featuredPostTag":"Featured Post","featuredPosts":"Featured Posts","frequentlyAskedQuestions":"Frequently Asked Questions","iD":"cloo091nz102671vmejdpdtdz1","leaveAComment":"Leave a comment","minRead":"min read","newerPosts":"Previous Page","nextPost":"Next Post","noCommentsYet":"No comments yet","olderPosts":"Next Page","page":"Page","pageNotFound":"Page Not Found","pickATopic":"Pick A Topic","pinnedPost":"Pinned Post","previousPost":"Previous Post","readMore":"Read More","resultsFound":"results found","searchPlaceholder":"Search","searchPlaceholderNav":"Search","searchTopics":"Search topics","searching":"searching","siteID":4298,"submit":"Submit","updatedAt":{"$__toml_private_datetime":"2023-11-07T07:23:52.367Z"},"viewOlderPosts":"View Older Posts","visit":"Visit Site","visitHomePage":"Visit Home Page","writeSomethingMeaningful":"Write something meaningful","youMayAlsoWantToRead":"You may also want to read","yourCommentHasBeenSubmitted":"Your comment has been submitted","yourEmail":"Email","yourName":"Name"}`);

            const submitButton = document.getElementById('comment-submit');
            const emailInput = document.getElementById('comment-email');
            const nameInput = document.getElementById('comment-name');
            const contentInput = document.getElementById('comment-content');
            const addAnotherCommentButton = document.getElementById('add-another-comment');
            const commentError = document.getElementById('comment-error');
            const commentListLoading = document.getElementById('comment-list-loading');
            const commentListError = document.getElementById('comment-list-error');

            document.getElementById('btnShowCommentForm').addEventListener('click', () => {
                fetchComments();

                document.getElementById('btnShowCommentForm').classList.add('hidden');
                document.getElementById('comment-form-container').classList.remove('hidden');
                document.getElementById('commentForm').classList.remove('hidden');
                document.getElementById('comment-list').classList.remove('hidden');
                submitButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    setLoadingState(true);
                    fetch(`https://write.superblog.ai/api/public/comments`, {
                        method: 'POST',
                        headers: {
                            'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            comment: {
                                email: emailInput.value,
                                postCuid: cuid,
                                siteCuid: siteCuid,
                                name: nameInput.value,
                                content: contentInput.value,
                            },
                        }),
                    }).then(async (res) => {
                        setLoadingState(false);
                        if (res.status === 200) {
                            document.getElementById('comment-success-container').classList.remove('hidden');
                            document.getElementById('commentForm').classList.add('hidden');
                            emailInput.value = '';
                            nameInput.value = '';
                            contentInput.value = '';
                            commentError.classList.add('hidden');
                        } else {
                            commentError.classList.remove('hidden');
                            const data = await res.json();
                            commentError.textContent = data.error.message;
                        }
                    });
                });
            });

            addAnotherCommentButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
                document.getElementById('commentForm').classList.remove('hidden');
                document.getElementById('comment-success-container').classList.add('hidden');
                commentError.classList.add('hidden');
            });

            function setLoadingState(loading) {
                submitButton.disabled = loading;
                submitButton.textContent = loading ? 'Please wait...' : localeData.submit;
                emailInput.disabled = loading;
                nameInput.disabled = loading;
                contentInput.disabled = loading;
            }

            function formatDate(isoString) {
                const date = new Date(isoString);
                return date.toLocaleDateString(undefined, {
                    year: 'numeric',
                    month: 'short',
                    day: 'numeric'
                });
            }

            function fetchComments() {
                document.getElementById('comment-list-loading').classList.remove('hidden');
                fetch(`https://write.superblog.ai/api/public/comments?postCuid=${cuid}`)
                    .then(async (res) => {
                        document.getElementById('comment-list-loading').classList.add('hidden');
                        if (res.status === 200) {
                            const data = await res.json();
                            const comments = data.comments;
                            comments.forEach(comment => {
                                const commentElement = document.createElement('div');
                                commentElement.classList.add('py-3', 'px-4', 'w-full', 'bg-primary/5', 'rounded-box');
                                commentElement.innerHTML = `
                                <div class="flex flex-col gap-2 w-full">
                                    ${comment.flair ? `<span class="-mb-2 badge badge-outline badge-primary badge-xs">${comment.flair}</span>` : ''}
                                    <div class="flex justify-between items-center w-full">
                                        <h3 class="text-md">${comment.name}</h3>
                                        <p class="text-sm text-base-content/60">${formatDate(comment.createdAt)}</p>
                                    </div>
                                    <p class="text-sm text-base-content/60">${comment.content}</p>
                                </div>
                            `;
                                document.getElementById('comment-list').appendChild(commentElement);
                            });
                        } else {
                            document.getElementById('comment-list-error').classList.remove('hidden');
                            document.getElementById('comment-list-error').textContent = data.error.message;
                        }
                    });
            }

        })();
    </script>

    .lightbox {

        display: flex;

</style>
<script>
(function() {
    if (window.__lightboxGlobalInit) return;
    window.__lightboxGlobalInit = true;

    // Global escape key handler (bind once)
    document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
        if (e.key === 'Escape') {
            const lightbox = document.querySelector('.lightbox');
            if (lightbox) {
                lightbox.style.display = 'none';
            }
        }
    });

    // Use event delegation on document for image clicks
    document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        const img = e.target.closest('article img');
        if (!img) return;

        // Check if the img is inside an <a> tag
        if (img.parentNode.tagName.toLowerCase() === 'a') return;

        // Create lightbox div if it doesn't exist
        let lightbox = document.querySelector('.lightbox');
        if (!lightbox) {
            lightbox = document.createElement('div');
            lightbox.className = 'lightbox';
            document.body.appendChild(lightbox);

            lightbox.onclick = () => {
                lightbox.style.display = 'none';
            };
        }

        // Set the lightbox image and display the lightbox
        lightbox.innerHTML = `
        <span class="loading loading-spinner loading-xl lightbox-spinner"></span>
        <img src="${img.src.replace('-compressed.', '-original.')}" class="lightbox-img" style="opacity: 0;" />
        `;
        lightbox.style.display = 'flex';

        const lightboxImg = lightbox.querySelector('.lightbox-img');
        const spinner = lightbox.querySelector('.lightbox-spinner');

        lightboxImg.onload = () => {
            spinner.style.display = 'none';
            lightboxImg.style.opacity = '1';
            lightboxImg.style.transition = 'opacity 0.3s ease-in';
        };

        lightboxImg.onerror = () => {
            spinner.style.display = 'none';
            lightbox.innerHTML = '<div class="text-error">Failed to load image</div>';
        };
    });

    // Set cursor style on images (needs to run on each page)
    function initImageCursors() {
        document.querySelectorAll('article img').forEach((img) => {
            if (img.parentNode.tagName.toLowerCase() !== 'a') {
                img.style.cursor = 'pointer';
            }
        });
    }

    // Run on initial load
    if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initImageCursors);
    } else {
        initImageCursors();
    }

    // Re-run cursor init on Turbo navigation
    document.addEventListener('turbo:load', initImageCursors);
})();
</script>

        <div id="search-modal-container" data-turbo-permanent>
<div id="search-modal" class="hidden fixed inset-0 z-50">
    <div id="search-backdrop" class="absolute inset-0 bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-sm"></div>
    <div class="flex justify-center items-start px-4 pt-[10vh] sm:pt-[15vh]">
        <div id="search-container" class="relative w-full max-w-2xl rounded-xl border shadow-2xl bg-base-100 border-base-300">
            <div class="p-4 border-b border-base-200">
                <div class="relative">
                    <svg class="absolute left-3 top-1/2 w-5 h-5 -translate-y-1/2 text-base-content/50" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                        <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M21 21l-6-6m2-5a7 7 0 11-14 0 7 7 0 0114 0z" />
                    </svg>
                    <input type="text" id="search-input" placeholder="Search" autocomplete="off"
                           class="py-3 pr-4 pl-10 w-full text-lg rounded-lg border-0 outline-none bg-base-200 text-base-content placeholder:text-base-content/50 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20" />
                    <div class="absolute right-3 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2">
                        <kbd class="px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs border rounded border-base-300 bg-base-100 text-base-content/50">ESC</kbd>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div id="search-results" class="overflow-y-auto max-h-[60vh]">
                <div id="search-initial" class="p-8 text-center text-base-content/50">Type to search...</div>
                <div id="search-loading" class="hidden p-8 text-center text-base-content/50">
                    <span class="loading loading-spinner loading-md"></span>
                    <p class="mt-2">Loading...</p>
                </div>
                <div id="search-empty" class="hidden p-8 text-center text-base-content/50">No results found</div>
                <ul id="search-list" class="hidden p-2"></ul>
            </div>
            <div class="flex gap-4 justify-center p-3 text-xs border-t border-base-200 text-base-content/50">
                <span><kbd class="px-1 py-0.5 rounded border border-base-300 bg-base-200">â†‘â†“</kbd> Navigate</span>
                <span><kbd class="px-1 py-0.5 rounded border border-base-300 bg-base-200">â†µ</kbd> Open</span>
                <span><kbd class="px-1 py-0.5 rounded border border-base-300 bg-base-200">esc</kbd> Close</span>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script>
(function() {
    if (window.__fuseSearchInitialized) return;
    window.__fuseSearchInitialized = true;

    let fuse = null;
    let isOpen = false;
    let selectedIndex = -1;

    const searchModal = document.getElementById('search-modal');
    const backdrop = document.getElementById('search-backdrop');
    const input = document.getElementById('search-input');
    const initialState = document.getElementById('search-initial');
    const loadingState = document.getElementById('search-loading');
    const emptyState = document.getElementById('search-empty');
    const resultsList = document.getElementById('search-list');

    if (!searchModal || !input) return;

    function showState(state) {
        initialState.classList.add('hidden');
        loadingState.classList.add('hidden');
        emptyState.classList.add('hidden');
        resultsList.classList.add('hidden');

        if (state === 'initial') initialState.classList.remove('hidden');
        else if (state === 'loading') loadingState.classList.remove('hidden');
        else if (state === 'empty') emptyState.classList.remove('hidden');
        else if (state === 'results') resultsList.classList.remove('hidden');
    }

    async function initSearch() {
        if (fuse) return;
        showState('loading');

        try {
            if (!window.Fuse) {
                await new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
                    const script = document.createElement('script');
                    script.src = 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/fuse.js@7.0.0/dist/fuse.min.js';
                    script.onload = resolve;
                    script.onerror = reject;
                    document.head.appendChild(script);
                });
            }

            const baseUrl = 'https://segwise.ai/blog'.replace(/\/$/, '');
            const response = await fetch(baseUrl + '/search_index.en.json');
            let searchData = await response.json();

            // Add baseUrl to each item's path for proper URL construction
            searchData = searchData.map(item => ({
                ...item,
                fullUrl: baseUrl + (item.path || '/')
            }));

            // Filter out home page and pagination pages
            searchData = searchData.filter(item => {
                const path = item.path || '';
                if (path === '/' || /^\/page\/\d+\/?$/.test(path)) return false;
                return true;
            });

            fuse = new Fuse(searchData, {
                keys: [
                    { name: 'title', weight: 0.8 },
                    { name: 'description', weight: 0.5 },
                    { name: 'body', weight: 0.3 }
                ],
                threshold: 0.3,
                distance: 100,
                minMatchCharLength: 2,
                includeScore: true,
                includeMatches: true,
                ignoreLocation: true
            });

            showState('initial');
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('Search init failed:', error);
            emptyState.textContent = 'Search unavailable';
            showState('empty');
        }
    }

    function decodeHtml(text) {
        const div = document.createElement('div');
        div.innerHTML = text;
        return div.textContent;
    }

    function escapeHtml(text) {
        const div = document.createElement('div');
        div.textContent = text;
        return div.innerHTML;
    }

    function performSearch(query) {
        if (!fuse || query.length < 2) {
            showState('initial');
            return;
        }

        const results = fuse.search(query).slice(0, 10);
        if (results.length === 0) {
            showState('empty');
            return;
        }

        resultsList.innerHTML = results.map((result, index) => {
            const item = result.item;
            const title = escapeHtml(decodeHtml(item.title || ''));
            // Add space between words that got merged (e.g., "IntroductionBlogging" -> "Introduction Blogging")
            let bodyText = decodeHtml(item.body || '');
            bodyText = bodyText.replace(/([a-z])([A-Z])/g, '$1 $2'); // camelCase split
            bodyText = bodyText.replace(/\s+/g, ' ').trim(); // normalize whitespace
            const excerpt = bodyText ? escapeHtml(bodyText.slice(0, 120)) + '...' : '';
            const url = item.fullUrl || item.path || '/';
            return `<li>
                <a href="${url}" data-index="${index}"
                   class="flex flex-col gap-1 p-3 rounded-lg transition-colors hover:bg-base-200 search-result ${index === 0 ? 'bg-base-200' : ''}">
                    <span class="font-medium font-post-headings text-base-content">${title}</span>
                    <span class="text-sm font-serif line-clamp-2 text-base-content/60">${excerpt}</span>
                </a>
            </li>`;
        }).join('');

        showState('results');
        selectedIndex = 0;
        updateSelection();
    }

    function updateSelection() {
        const items = resultsList.querySelectorAll('.search-result');
        items.forEach((item, i) => {
            item.classList.toggle('bg-base-200', i === selectedIndex);
            if (i === selectedIndex) item.scrollIntoView({ block: 'nearest' });
        });
    }

    window.openFuseSearch = function() {
        if (isOpen) return;
        isOpen = true;
        selectedIndex = -1;
        searchModal.classList.remove('hidden');
        document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
        initSearch().then(() => input.focus());
    };

    window.closeFuseSearch = function() {
        if (!isOpen) return;
        isOpen = false;
        searchModal.classList.add('hidden');
        document.body.style.overflow = '';
        input.value = '';
        showState('initial');
    };

    // Modal event listeners
    backdrop.addEventListener('click', window.closeFuseSearch);

    let timeout;
    input.addEventListener('input', (e) => {
        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(() => performSearch(e.target.value.trim()), 150);
    });

    resultsList.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        if (e.target.closest('.search-result')) window.closeFuseSearch();
    });

    resultsList.addEventListener('mouseover', (e) => {
        const link = e.target.closest('.search-result');
        if (link) { selectedIndex = parseInt(link.dataset.index, 10); updateSelection(); }
    });

    // Global keyboard handler
    document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
        if ((e.metaKey || e.ctrlKey) && e.key === 'k') {
            e.preventDefault();
            isOpen ? window.closeFuseSearch() : window.openFuseSearch();
            return;
        }
        if (!isOpen) return;
        if (e.key === 'Escape') { e.preventDefault(); window.closeFuseSearch(); return; }

        const items = resultsList.querySelectorAll('.search-result');
        const count = items.length;
        if (e.key === 'ArrowDown' && count) { e.preventDefault(); selectedIndex = (selectedIndex + 1) % count; updateSelection(); }
        if (e.key === 'ArrowUp' && count) { e.preventDefault(); selectedIndex = selectedIndex <= 0 ? count - 1 : selectedIndex - 1; updateSelection(); }
        if (e.key === 'Enter' && selectedIndex >= 0 && items[selectedIndex]) { e.preventDefault(); window.location.href = items[selectedIndex].href; }
    });
})();
</script>
</div>
